channel.title: 474/317 Hitmarks - Removing 0 on miss
channel.description:
The title pretty much explains it, how do i remove the 0 from the blue hitmark? That way it's just the splat just no number on it.
EDIT: Also I checked to see if the number is on the sprite itself and it's not.
